response.overview: In Prizren, in Rufai’s Masjid, love for religion and belief is being transmitted on the birthday of the prophet Ali and the Day of Sulltani Nevruz. Members of this Masjid under the leadership of Shejh and Dervishs mark this day on 21st of March and celebrate it by doing ziker, sing mevlud and read the Quran. Acts of worship in this day done by the Shejh and other Dervishs are rituals known as qeramet, while the most important ones are those with small swords.  This documentary shows real act of worship.
response.title: Love
